Few people realize it, but the Eastern European anti-hero is why the world knows that Hillary Clinton maintained a private email server while secretary of state.

As in: “They got her on a Guccifer.”

Guccifer is the nom de Internet of the Romanian hacker Marcel Lehel Lazar.
This week he may have made Mrs. Clinton’s road to the White House a lot rougher.
Though maybe, in Hillary Clinton’s case, it would be better phrased as a crime.
Maybe it should be a verb: To be Guccifered.
